topic.title: How to Change the Header Separators (between Sections and Chapter titles)

body.p:
There are a number of strings defined for part, chapter and sections. Each of these strings start with the " | " as a separator. For example, in the header of a page you may find a sequence of such strings:My Publication | Introduction | Getting Started
"My Publication" is the value of the maptitle string.
"Introduction" is the value of the chaptertitle string.
"Getting Started" is the value of the sectiontitle string.
